data.name: Youtube - Wide video container
data.description: Makes the main video container on youtube wider. Especially on a 2K monitor the default youtube container is ridiculously narrow, but even on 1080p using this means at least one more column of videos visible. Turn on "Fade++ compatibility mode" to use with Fade++ YT now uses a different system for displaying the videos on (only) the homepage. Due to how it works, manipulating it via CSS only is difficult. I have opted to just disable all extra CSS rules for the home page. If you'd like to see the home page improved, please use >this script< instead. Subscriptions page and all others should work as before. I may or may not keep updating this here. The script version is the superior version. I suggest using it instead.

data.name: forum.snahp.it Basic Theme Dark Mode
data.description:
Dark mode/Night mode for the basic theme on snahp.it forums.

For this theme to work properly, you first need to change your theme on your snahp.it profile. To do this, go to 'User Control Panel' > 'Board Preferences' > 'Edit Global Settings' and set 'My board style' to 'Basic'.
